title: Should be easy, can't figure it out.
content:
I am looking for a font identification on the "Berbati" below the logo.

I appreciate the help very much.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_4377.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824234634/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_4377.jpeg) | 118.53 KB |
author: shootzy

comments.content:
At first glance looked like Perpetua, but the center stroke on E is shorter and T lacks the top spurs.  
don
Thanks. Looks like with a little manipulation to that E and flattening out the top of the T it should be pretty darn close. Appreciate the response.
